resources.string: Certain devices can not capture large emojis. During the GIF saving process - the emoji size will be reduced in an effort to capture it! The default is size 20, but you may be able to try a larger size. To try a larger emoji size go to your settings!
Please allow this process to complete on its own!\n GIF settings can be changed in App Settings! (top left button)
Like this app?\nPlease rate us on the play store!\n

Thank you for downloading FUN.gif! This is where you can find information on App Updates: 

 December 9, 2018 Initial Release:
 Although this app is still in production, we wanted release an early beta so users can start to enjoy FUN.gif! This will also allow us to get a jumpstart on tracking analytics and app performance along with user experience so our final product will be the best it can be. We are excited to announce many more features are being designed, developed and integrated into this app! Beta testers will also have be awarded with a PRO feature upon official release. Please give feedback on the playstore and we will take them into consideration.
